name: Stay Inside the Ring
description:
🎮 WASD to move, SPACE to kick the ring.  🔴 Kick the ring into the enemies to kill them. ❇️ You lose health outside and heal inside the ring. 

Made in less than three hours for the Trijam #215. The theme was "Get back in the ring!".

🎵 "Bleeping Demo" Kevin MacLeod (incompetech.com)
